description: [BlackCat](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1068) can use Windows commands such as `fsutil behavior set SymLinkEvaluation R2L:1` to redirect file system access to a different location after gaining access into compromised networks.(Citation: Microsoft BlackCat Jun 2022)

external_references.description: Microsoft Defender Threat Intelligence. (2022, June 13). The many lives of BlackCat ransomware. Retrieved December 20, 2022.
